name: Schedule 15N-5G Technology Explained - The Future is here

messages.textToSpeech: How else can I help you ?
messages.displayText: 5G will provide a graceful migration path from 4G/LTE-Advanced and unleash a lot of industrial applications with its 3 primary use cases gravitating towards - enhanced mobile broadband (eMBB), ultra-reliable low latency communication (uRLLC), and massive proliferation of IoT and massive M2M communications (mMTC). 5G truly will usher in the future digital economy.

messages.speech: The 5G evolution is being positioned as the most anticipated. Everyone wants and expects it everywhere - like food and electricity. All of 5G innovations and industry applications are targeted to provide next-gen immersive applications for everyone. From accelerating Industrial IoT to virtual shopping and gaming experiences, from making autonomous cars a reality to accelerating precision agriculture, 5G has the potential to touch all aspects of our lives - as a true fabric of society. 5G is much impactful than just the 1Gbps speed it promises on your smartphone.
